name: ART. IS. DEAD.
description:
ART. IS. DEAD. is a GameMaker platformer based on the Dada art movement's aesthetics that examines the five-step grieving process through a visual and dialogue-focused narrative. We follow our narrator as they try to help the suffering characters in this strange new world work through their grief, even as the narrator struggles with their own grief that they've avoided for so long. 

Battle glitchy enemies, chat to odd characters, and explore a world that takes away your abilities one by one, even as the environment becomes more and more difficult to navigate.
